title: Hour 1 - NBA Western Conference Finals Game 1, NIL
itunes:title: Hour 1 - NBA Western Conference Finals Game 1, NIL
description:
Dan breaks down Game 1 of the NBA Western Conference Finals, including Draymond Green's assertion the he is the greatest defensive player of all-time. And he wonders how the NIL rules in college sports will affect parity in NCAA athletics. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
